SEARCH
Package com.wileyedge.fashiontrendanalysis.service

Class ProductServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.wileyedge.fashiontrendanalysis.service.ProductServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProductService
@Service public class ProductServiceImpl extends Object implements ProductService
Implementation of the ProductService interface. This class provides concrete implementations for managing products in the application.

      Specified by:
